item.description:
Yes KFC...korean fried chicken! Double fried, spicy and soy garlic...double yum. They also have other dishes - bi bim bap, sushi, etc. Unfortunately they don't take reservations, but hopefully it's not as crowded since the students aren't back yet. Well we can only hope.

As always - only RSVP if you are going to come and update ASAP if your plans change. Don't be a flake.

How to get there - take the greenline B train to Packard's corner (super 88) and walk a few blocks or take it one more stop to Harvard Ave and walk to Brighton Ave.

Parking - always tough in this area. There are more spots available closer towards Super 88.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be outside area after we put in reservations. And we'll provide contact tele # to those that RSVP.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: KFC!
